analysis_all_hatchery_district_wise.description: Hatchery analysis data by district and year. Tracks functional/non-functional departmental hatcheries, owner-built hatcheries, and exotic/IMC (Indian Major Carp) production metrics for fish breeding programs. Contains data for 26 districts with details on hatchery infrastructure and fish seed production capacity.

columns.division_name: Administrative division name (9 divisions in Bihar)
columns.district_name: District name where hatcheries are located
columns.source: Source of data - Animal & Fisheries Department
columns.number_of_departmental_scheme_hatcheries: Count of non-functional hatcheries built under departmental schemes
columns.number_of_functional_hatcheries_Number: Count of functional hatcheries operational in the district
columns.number_of_hatcheries_built_by_department: Total count of hatcheries constructed by departmental schemes
columns.number_of_hatcheries_built_by_owner_Numb: Count of hatcheries built and operated by private owners
columns.total_number_of_hatcheries_Number: Total number of all hatcheries (functional and non-functional) in the district
columns.total_production_of_exotic_fingerling_La: Total production of exotic fish fingerlings in Lakh units
columns.total_production_of_exotic_fry_Lakh: Total production of exotic fish fry in Lakh units
columns.total_production_of_exotic_spawn_Lakh: Total production of exotic fish spawn (eggs) in Lakh units
columns.total_production_of_imc_fingerling_Lakh: Total production of Indian Major Carp (IMC) fingerlings in Lakh units
columns.total_production_of_imc_fry_Lakh: Total production of Indian Major Carp (IMC) fry in Lakh units
columns.total_production_of_imc_spawn_Lakh: Total production of Indian Major Carp (IMC) spawn (eggs) in Lakh units

areas_without_jalkars_by_range_district_.description: Geographic inventory of areas without jalkars (water bodies) at panchayat level across Bihar. Lists all panchayats organized by administrative hierarchy (division, district, block) that do not have designated water bodies for fisheries activities. Contains 1675 records identifying gaps in water body coverage.

columns.division_name: Administrative division name (9 divisions in Bihar)
columns.district_name: District name in which the panchayat is located
columns.panchayat_name: Panchayat (village council) name without any jalkar resources

details_fcs_district_wise.description: Fisheries Cooperative Society (FCS) aggregate statistics by district and year. Provides district-level summary of cooperative societies including total number of cooperatives, membership count broken down by gender, and block distribution. Contains 76 records covering 38 districts across 2 years.

columns.source: Source of data - Animal & Fisheries Department
columns.total_number_of_blocks_in_districts_Numb: Total number of administrative blocks/taluks in the district
columns.total_number_of_cooperative_societies_in: Total count of registered Fisheries Cooperative Societies (FCS) in the district
columns.total_number_of_female_members_Number: Total number of female members enrolled across all FCS in the district
columns.total_number_of_male_members_Number: Total number of male members enrolled across all FCS in the district
columns.total_number_of_members_in_societies_Num: Total membership (male + female) across all FCS in the district

details_newly_formed_fcs_district_wise.description: Individual records of newly formed Fisheries Cooperative Societies (FCS) with complete organizational and membership details. Includes FCS name, location details, member enrollment information, registration date, and classification as Inland or Marine cooperative. Contains 497 records of new cooperatives established across Bihar.

columns.division_name: Administrative division name where FCS is established
columns.name_of_newly_formed_cooperative_societi: Official name of the newly formed Fisheries Cooperative Society
columns.block_name: Block/sub-district where the FCS headquarters is located
columns.total_number_of_members_enrolled: Total number of members registered in the FCS
columns.total_number_of_male_members_enrolled: Number of male members in the FCS
columns.total_number_of_female_members_enrolled: Number of female members in the FCS
columns.date_of_registration: Date when the FCS was officially registered (DD.MM.YYYY format)
columns.whether_Inland_or_Marine_FCS: Classification of FCS - Inland (freshwater) or Marine (saltwater) fisheries

jalkars_spread_across_multiple_panchayat.description: Detailed records of jalkars (water bodies) that span across multiple panchayat boundaries, requiring inter-panchayat administration. Documents shared water resources organized by administrative division, district, block, and panchayat with area and revenue information. Contains 205 records of multi-panchayat jalkars.

columns.division_name: Administrative division name where the jalkar is primarily located
columns.panchayat_name: Primary panchayat name where the jalkar originates
columns.total_rakba_in_hectares: Total area of the water body (jalkar) measured in hectares
columns.total_jamarashi_in_lakh_rupees: Total revenue/demand amount for the jalkar in Lakh Rupees
columns.jalkars_located_in_multiple_panchayat: Name or identifier of secondary panchayat(s) where the jalkar extends beyond the primary panchayat boundary
columns.district_name: District name where the jalkar is located
columns.jalkar_name: Official name/identifier of the water body (jalkar)

list_of_jalkars_with_unclear_settlement_.description: PRIMARY TABLE: Comprehensive inventory of 31,036 jalkars (water bodies) with detailed information at panchayat level across all 38 Bihar districts. Contains jalkar names, locations, settlement status (Settled With Co-Operative, Unsettled, Open Bid, Close Bid, Free Fishing, etc.), land records (khata, khasra), area measurements, security deposits, and special designations (free fishing zones, PERTA, court cases). Use for queries about: jalkar names/counts by district/division/block/panchayat, settlement status, security deposits, PERTA jalkars, free fishing zones, court cases, land records. Search keywords: jalkar, water body, settlement status, unsettled, co-operative, open bid, close bid, free fishing, PERTA, khata, khasra, security deposit, court case, panchayat wise, district wise, block wise, jalkar name, jalkar list, jalkar count, jalkar distribution, jalkar breakdown.

columns.division_name: Administrative division name where the jalkar is located
columns.district_name: District name where the jalkar is located
columns.panchayat_name: Panchayat (village council) name where the jalkar is situated
columns.jalkars_name: Official name/identifier of the water body (jalkar)
columns.khata_number: Land record khata (account/lease) number in the revenue system
columns.khasra_number: Khasra (individual plot) number identifying the specific land parcel of the water body
columns.total_rakba_in_hectares: Total area of the water body measured in hectares
columns.settlement_status: Current settlement/lease status of the jalkar (Settled, Unsettled, In Dispute, With Co-operative, etc.)
columns.security_deposit_amount_in_lakh: Security deposit/lease fee collected for the jalkar in Lakh Rupees
columns.number_of_jalkars_pending_in_court_cases: Count of jalkars with legal/court cases pending resolution
columns.area_of_jalkars_pending_in_court_cases_i: Total area of jalkars under court litigation measured in hectares
columns.number_of_jalkars_declared_for_free_fish: Count of jalkars designated for free/open fishing zones for public benefit
columns.area_of_jalkars_declared_for_free_fishin: Total area of free fishing jalkars measured in hectares
columns.number_of_jalkars_declared_as_perta: Count of jalkars declared under PERTA (Pradesh Environmental Resource Tax on Aquaculture) scheme
columns.area_of_jalkars_declared_as_perta_in_hec: Total area of PERTA jalkars measured in hectares
columns.amount_of_jalkars_declared_as_perta_in_l: Revenue collected from PERTA jalkars in Lakh Rupees

total_revenue_jalkar_report.description: Annual district-level fisheries production and revenue report tracking targets and actuals. Comprehensive data on fish production from all aquatic resources, seed production by type (fingerling, fry, spawn, yearling), inter-state trade (export/import), and revenue collection. Contains 76 records covering 38 districts across multiple years.

columns.source: Source of data - Directorate of Fisheries
columns.annual_fish_production_target_from_all_a: Annual fish production target from all aquatic resources in Thousand Metric Tons
columns.annual_revenue_collected_against_the_tar: Actual annual revenue collected from fisheries against the target in Lakh Rupees
columns.annual_revenue_collection_target_from_ja: Revenue collection target specifically from jalkar (water body) settlement/lease fees in Lakh Rupees
columns.current_fish_exported_to_other_states_Th: Quantity of fish currently exported from Bihar to other states in Thousand Metric Tons
columns.current_fish_imported_from_other_states_: Quantity of fish currently imported into Bihar from other states in Thousand Metric Tons
columns.current_fish_production_Thousand_Metric_: Actual current fish production in the district in Thousand Metric Tons
columns.fish_seed_fingerling_current_production_: Current production of fish fingerlings (juvenile stage) in numbers
columns.fish_seed_fry_current_production_Number: Current production of fish fry (larval stage) in numbers
columns.fish_seed_production_fry_annual_target_N: Annual target for fish fry production in numbers
columns.fish_seed_production_spawn_current_count: Current production of fish spawn (eggs) in numbers
columns.fish_seed_yearling_current_production_Nu: Current production of fish yearlings (1-year-old juveniles) in numbers
